title: We support 150 young soccer players in the TDS
content: “We continue to move forward for the development of soccer in Honduras”. Snacks Yummies reinforces its commitment to Honduran soccer with its sponsorship of the 2nd edition of the TDS (Talent Development Scheme) Tournament, where 150 players between the ages of 13 and 14 participated, with 6 teams in total. The tournament was held from February 11 to 25 at the Humberto Micheletti Stadium in El Progreso and at the Olimpia High Performance Center. Divided into two groups, the first made up of: SPS, La Ceiba and Occidente and in the second TGU, Choluteca and Danlí. As a result, TGU and Occidente were the two finalists. In this final, played in La Casa de La H, Siguatepeque, the successes and efforts of the players were celebrated. Crowning the champion TGU and giving trophies and medals to the finalists, as well as 4 goal scorers with the same number of goals and an award for “Least Defeated Goalkeeper”.
